description: VLC-Alarmclock is a cross-platform scheduler that launches VLC with your chosen media at set times. Wake to playlists or radio streams, define recurring weekday/weekend rules, ramp volume with configurable fade-in curves, and auto-stop via sleep timers. Use one-shot CLI commands or reusable JSON presets.
